resources.string: 背景设置模式(点击设置&长按复原)
取消关闭移动数据确认

Here is the manual for lin15.


But all Android 7.0 or 8.0 and can be installed xposed framework ROM can probably set the background image

 I did not use resource hooks
 But written in Java code
 

Picture quality, personally think that ordinary quality is enough
 The memory is the best half
 I can’t see any difference.
 Of course, large memory users are free


Gaussian blur, you can feel free
 The larger the fuzzy value, the more blurred


Custom height function has been returned

For some ROMs, you cannot get the height directly from the drop-down quick settings panel.
If you are always prompted to get the height 

Then try the custom height

The general height is 1200~1400

The data is not very accurate

Subject to the actual situation of the personal phone 


Background scrolling and reel background features are currently only used as tests

Because there are still bugs that can not be solved

So leave a switch for you to decide if you do not need it.

Resetting the systemUI function is a big trick that is very hurtful.

Otherwise it is not recommended to use it unless you want to delete all configurations


The following features are only for lineageOS15
 Please do not be naughty for everyone who is not lineageOS

1、Hide app features
 Its entrance is at lineageOS15 official desktop -> HOME SETTINGS(This option appears after long pressing the blank space on the desktop) -> More -> 隐藏应用(Hidden application) 


2、Cancellation pop prompt when you close the mobile data
 When you close the mobile data, 
 there will be no more pop-up prompts to close,
 but close directly.

 I am legend
 An ingenious developer
 
 (The above translation is from Google Translate)
Click to select image\n Long press to clear

In order to write this module
 there is no reading source code
 Also for this headache for a few days
 If you like this module
 There is also a certain amount of savings
 Then please let me drink a can of Coke
 Thanks

 If you are not rich
 Please do not donate
 Because all features of lin15 are free Even if you do not donate
 The same can be used


 (The above translation is from Google Translate)
"Thanks to donations(Long press to save the picture)"
The picture is saved in sdcard/lin15,Thank you for your reward and encouragement~
Please pull down the quick setting panel to the bottom in portrait mode.
Please pull down the quick setting panel to the bottom in the horizontal screen state.
Unable to get accurate width and height, please pull down the quick setting panel once
Unable to get accurate width and height, please set it after horizontal screen
Enter 0 to clear the custom height

Resetting systemUI means actively deleting the local data of Lin15 in systemUI
 For example, sharedPreferences for saving various variables and saved background images will be deleted. 
 The purpose of this function is that after the user uninstalls lin15, the sharedPreferences left by lin15 and the set pictures will remain in the systemUI. If the user does not want this data to remain in the phone
 you can use this feature to delete the remaining traces. 
 Note that after using this function
 please uninstall the app and restart your phone. 
 This function has another function
 which is to clear the old traces
 reset all settings, then your phone will be restored to the way you have never installed lin15
 everything starts again, it is strongly recommended to restart the phone after reset

If you can not get the height automatically
 try using the custom image height method in the menu bar in the upper right corner
 After entering the custom height
 you can select the image settings
 Please check the specific height
 usually around 1200~1400
Unable to get valid width\n If this message appears multiple times\n please rotate the screen and try again

This is the log that can open the app
For debugging and recording
 If the log is turned on
 Will generate a lot of logs
 The function of the log is to help developers find the reason for the setting failure.
 If you use it normally
 Please do not open this option
 If you can not set the background 
 Then please open it
 Then set the background image
 Go to the xposed frame and find the log
 You can see where the problem is running 
 If you do not understand 
 Please send me the log file
This module has not been activated in xposed,Please go to activation before using
